price: 182. Qofkiise uga cabsada eex ama denbi dardaarmaha ee ka sameeya heshiis35 dhexdooda oo wax hagaajiya, ma saarna denbi korkiisa. hubaal Alle waa Denbi Dhaaf Badane, Naxariis Badan.
arabic: فَمَنۡ خَافَ مِن مُّوصٖ جَنَفًا أَوۡ إِثۡمٗا فَأَصۡلَحَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ فَلَآ إِثۡمَ عَلَيۡهِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ
footnotes: 35. Hagaajinta iyo sama ka talinta Aayaddu xustay waa amar in dardaarmaha uu ku caddaalad falo dardaarankiisa si waafaqsan xuduudda sharciga.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: faman khāfa min mūṣin janafan aw ith'man fa-aṣlaḥa baynahum falā ith'ma ʿalayhi inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
